location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No 61 from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Muscat to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of a communication (No 1020) dated 23 September 1824, concerning subjects of the Pasha of Bagdad [Baghdad]. In response, it states that the aforementioned subjects had not arrived at Bushire at the time of the Resident's departure, but that instructions have been issued directing that passage to Bussora [Basra] is to be provided for them.
